title: 202: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 6 (Finally Getting to Know The Men (YAY & YIKES) + Dale Cheating?! + Much More!)
itunes:title: 202: Tayshia’s Bachelorette Recap: Ep 6 (Finally Getting to Know The Men (YAY & YIKES) + Dale Cheating?! + Much More!)
description:
The Broads laugh and argue through the latest recap of this #bachelorette episode - but first cover some current tea (Tayshia’s response to ex rumors, Dale possibly cheating on Clare, Kenny’s n*des, and more). Then The Broads dive into episode 6 chatting about their ever growing love for Tayshia, the “Grown Ass Man” date (count how many times it is said in the episode), Ed Vs. Chasen, the extremely dangerous cage fighting group date, Bekah’s crush on Noah, a potential future Team Brendan Vs. Team Noah conspiracy, and much more!
